subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Sam Reinhart, rated as one of the top prospects in Friday’s N.H.L. draft, would become the third of Paul Reinhart’s sons selected in five seasons.
snippet: Sam Reinhart, rated as one of the top prospects in Friday’s N.H.L. draft, would become the third of Paul Reinhart’s sons selected in five seasons.
